changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO limit_reduction_entity_reductions (limit_reduction_entity_id, reductions, index) SELECT lre.id, v.reduction, v.idx FROM limit_reduction_entity lre CROSS JOIN (VALUES (0, 1), (1, 1), (2, 1), (3, 1), (4, 1), (5, 1) ) AS v(idx, reduction) WHERE lre.index = 4;
